attributes.action: make it illegal for parents/guardians to suggest, force, or attempt to enforce a religion upon a child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It should be illegal for parents/guardians to suggest or force a religion upon a child.

It is wrong to attempt to persuade or "brain-wash" the minds of the young so that the parent/guardian has the clarity that they have "saved", or in my opinion "ruined", their children's lives.

This may be a biased idea, but shouldn't people be able to choose the religion they wish to follow, without the suggestion from another biased source, i.e. the parent/guardian, who selfishly wish to inject the poison of a false concept into the innocent consciousness of a child.

Thanks for reading.
--Liam Goodacre
